characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist, pedestrian
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with parked vehicles on both sides. A white sedan is parked on the left side of the road. A cyclist and a pedestrian are seen on the right side of the road. The cyclist suddenly moves from the right side towards the center of the road, potentially causing a dangerous situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while navigating through a road with parked vehicles on both sides. The vehicle is likely preparing to decelerate due to the sudden movement of the cyclist from the right side towards the center of the road.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, parked and partially blocking the view. 2) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 3 meters away, moving towards the center of the road. 3) Right side: A pedestrian, approximately 4 meters away, walking along the sidewalk.
